verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H2734>Fret<s%> not yourself because of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be you <S%H7065>envious<s%> against the <S%H6213>workers<s%> of <S%H5766>iniquity.<s%>
For they shall <S%H4120>soon<s%> be <S%H5243>cut<s%> <S%H5243>down<s%> like the <S%H2682>grass,<s%> and <S%H5034>wither<s%> as the <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H1877>herb.<s%>
<S%H982>Trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good;<s%> so shall you <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H530>truly<s%> you shall be <S%H7462>fed.<s%>
<S%H6026>Delight<s%> yourself also in the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H4862>desires<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H1556>Commit<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> also in him; and he shall <S%H6213>bring<s%> it to <S%H6213>pass.<s%>
And he shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> your <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H216>light,<s%> and your <S%H4941>judgment<s%> as the <S%H6672>noonday.<s%>

<S%H1826>Rest<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H2342>wait<s%> <S%H2342>patiently<s%> for him: <S%H2734>fret<s%> not yourself because of him who <S%H6743>prospers<s%> in his <S%H1870>way,<s%> because of the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H6213>brings<s%> <S%H4209>wicked<s%> <S%H4209>devices<s%> to <S%H6213>pass.<s%>
<S%H7503>Cease<s%> from <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H2534>wrath:<s%> <S%H2734>fret<s%> not yourself in any wise to do <S%H7489>evil.<s%>
For <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off: but those that <S%H6960>wait<s%> on the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> they shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
For <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> while, and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall not be: yes, you shall <S%H995>diligently<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> his <S%H4725>place,<s%> and it shall not be.
But the <S%H6035>meek<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and shall <S%H6026>delight<s%> themselves in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2161>plots<s%> against the <S%H6662>just,<s%> and <S%H2786>gnashes<s%> on him with his <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>
The <S%H136>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at him: for he <S%H7200>sees<s%> that his <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>coming.<s%>

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H6605>drawn<s%> out the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and have <S%H1869>bent<s%> their <S%H7198>bow,<s%> to <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> and to <S%H2873>slay<s%> such as be of <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H1870>conversation.<s%>
Their <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and their <S%H7198>bows<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken.<s%>
A <S%H4592>little<s%> that a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man has is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1995>riches<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5564>upholds<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8549>upright:<s%> and their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> shall be for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
They shall not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> in the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time:<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7459>famine<s%> they shall be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>

But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish,<s%> and the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be as the <S%H3368>fat<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs:<s%> they shall <S%H3615>consume;<s%> into <S%H6227>smoke<s%> shall they <S%H3615>consume<s%> away.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3867>borrows,<s%> and <S%H7999>pays<s%> not <S%H7999>again:<s%> but the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shows <S%H2603>mercy,<s%> and <S%H5414>gives.<s%>
For such as be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of him shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and they that be <S%H7043>cursed<s%> of him shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off.
The <S%H4703>steps<s%> of a good <S%H1397>man<s%> are <S%H3559>ordered<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and he <S%H2654>delights<s%> in his <S%H1870>way.<s%>
<S%H3588>Though<s%> he <S%H5307>fall,<s%> he shall not be utterly <S%H2904>cast<s%> <S%H2904>down:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5564>upholds<s%> him with his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

I have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5288>young,<s%> and now am <S%H2204>old;<s%> yet have I not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> nor his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H1245>begging<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
He is <S%H3605>ever<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H2603>merciful,<s%> and <S%H3867>lends;<s%> and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H1293>blessed.<s%>
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good;<s%> and <S%H7931>dwell<s%> for ever <S%H5769>more.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> not his <S%H2623>saints;<s%> they are <S%H8104>preserved<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> but the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>therein<s%> for <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1897>speaks<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1696>talks<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is in his <S%H3820>heart;<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of his <S%H838>steps<s%> shall <S%H4571>slide.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6822>watches<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H1245>seeks<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> him.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> him in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7561>condemn<s%> him when he is <S%H8199>judged.<s%>

<S%H6960>Wait<s%> on the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and he shall <S%H7311>exalt<s%> you to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H3772>cut<s%> off, you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> in great <S%H6184>power,<s%> and <S%H6168>spreading<s%> himself like a <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H249>bay<s%> tree.
Yet he <S%H5674>passed<s%> away, and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> he was not: yes, I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him, but he could not be <S%H4672>found.<s%>
<S%H8104>Mark<s%> the <S%H8535>perfect<s%> man, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H3477>upright:<s%> for the <S%H319>end<s%> of that <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
But the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> the <S%H319>end<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off.
But the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> he is their <S%H4581>strength<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5826>help<s%> them, and <S%H6403>deliver<s%> them: he shall <S%H6403>deliver<s%> them from the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> them, <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.
